description: This Python script demonstrates managing multiple AI teams with shared memory, including setup of agents, teams, and memory management, as well as running example responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific roles, models, and tools.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: Handles shared memory storage using SQLite database.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Manages in-memory data and interactions with storage.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a group of agents working together with shared instructions and memory.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response of a team or agent, streaming output.
